issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Hello,

I'd like to be able to get the network strength in Titanium Mobile.
Currently it is possible to retrieve type of network the device is connected to, by retrieving the networktype from Ti.Network.networkType.

This comes in handy especially in situations when loading heavy connection based data such as video.

This link might come in handy on developing this feature:
https://developer.appcelerator.com/question/154777/determining-network-connection-type-on-android-and-ios

Sincerely
Patrick van Vuuren

comments.body: Thanks for your feature request! The priority of this will be set by the Platform team.
